transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dt as string ('2021-01-27')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT [ARPT_NAME],[ARPT_CITY],[ARPT_CNTRY],[ARPT_IATA_CD],[ARPT_ICAO_CD],[ARPT_LAT],[ARPT_LONG],[ARPT_ALTD],[ARPT_UTC_OFSET],[ARPT_DST],[ARPT_TZONE],[LAST_UPDT_DT],[ADF_RUN_ID],[ADF_TIME_STMP] FROM [S_AIRPORTS] WHERE [LAST_UPDT_DT] > '"+$dt+"'"),
	format: 'query') ~> StgArpt
source(output(
		ARPT_ID as integer,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_LAT as decimal(8,6),
		ARPT_LONG as decimal(9,6),
		ARPT_ALTD as decimal(6,2),
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as decimal(2,2),
		ARPT_DST_CD as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		EFF_STRT_DT as timestamp,
		EFF_END_DT as timestamp,
		ACTV_IND as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DARPT
MapDrifted1, FilterTable exists(DARPT@ARPT_IATA_CD ==MapDrifted1@ARPT_IATA_CD || DARPT@ARPT_ICAO_CD ==MapDrifted1@ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> GetUpdatedRows
StgArpt derive(ARPT_NAME = toString(byName('ARPT_NAME')),
		ARPT_CITY = toString(byName('ARPT_CITY')),
		ARPT_CNTRY = toString(byName('ARPT_CNTRY')),
		ARPT_IATA_CD = toString(byName('ARPT_IATA_CD')),
		ARPT_ICAO_CD = toString(byName('ARPT_ICAO_CD')),
		ARPT_LAT = toDouble(byName('ARPT_LAT')),
		ARPT_LONG = toDouble(byName('ARPT_LONG')),
		ARPT_ALTD = toShort(byName('ARPT_ALTD')),
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET = toDouble(byName('ARPT_UTC_OFSET')),
		ARPT_DST = toString(byName('ARPT_DST')),
		ARPT_TZONE = toString(byName('ARPT_TZONE')),
		LAST_UPDT_DT = toDate(byName('LAST_UPDT_DT')),
		ADF_RUN_ID = toString(byName('ADF_RUN_ID')),
		ADF_TIME_STMP = toTimestamp(byName('ADF_TIME_STMP'))) ~> MapDrifted1
DropColumns2 derive(EFF_STRT_DT = currentDate(),
		EFF_END_DT = toDate('2050-01-01'),
		ACTV_IND = 'N') ~> AddADFColumns2
Join select(mapColumn(
		ARPT_NAME = MapDrifted1@ARPT_NAME,
		ARPT_CITY = MapDrifted1@ARPT_CITY,
		ARPT_CNTRY = MapDrifted1@ARPT_CNTRY,
		ARPT_IATA_CD = MapDrifted1@ARPT_IATA_CD,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD = MapDrifted1@ARPT_ICAO_CD,
		ARPT_LAT = MapDrifted1@ARPT_LAT,
		ARPT_LONG = MapDrifted1@ARPT_LONG,
		ARPT_ALTD = MapDrifted1@ARPT_ALTD,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET = MapDrifted1@ARPT_UTC_OFSET,
		ARPT_DST,
		ARPT_TZONE = MapDrifted1@ARPT_TZONE,
		LAST_UPDT_DT,
		ARPT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropColumns2
DARPT filter(ACTV_IND == 'Y') ~> FilterTable
GetUpdatedRows, FilterTable join(MapDrifted1@ARPT_IATA_CD == DARPT@ARPT_IATA_CD
	&& MapDrifted1@ARPT_ICAO_CD == DARPT@ARPT_ICAO_CD,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
AddADFColumns2 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		ARPT_ID as integer,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_LAT as decimal(8,6),
		ARPT_LONG as decimal(9,6),
		ARPT_ALTD as decimal(6,2),
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as decimal(2,2),
		ARPT_DST_CD as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		EFF_STRT_DT as timestamp,
		EFF_END_DT as timestamp,
		ACTV_IND as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ARPT_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ARPT_ID,
		ARPT_IATA_CD,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD,
		ARPT_NAME,
		ARPT_CNTRY,
		ARPT_CITY,
		ARPT_LAT,
		ARPT_LONG,
		ARPT_ALTD,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET,
		ARPT_DST_CD = ARPT_DST,
		ARPT_TZONE,
		EFF_STRT_DT,
		EFF_END_DT,
		ACTV_IND
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteUpdates
